item.title: DOOM: The Dark Ages second trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/doom-the-dark-ages-second-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A dark and sinister medieval war against Hell.

Publisher Bethesda Softworks and developer id Software have released the second official trailer for medieval first-person shooter DOOM: The Dark Ages.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bethesda Softworks:

About

Developed by id Software, DOOM: The Dark Ages is the prequel to the critically acclaimed DOOM (2016) and DOOM Eternal that tells the epic cinematic origin story of the DOOM Slayer’s rage. In this third installment of the modern DOOM series, players will step into the blood-stained boots of the DOOM Slayer, in this never-before-seen dark and sinister medieval war against Hell.

DOOM: The Dark Ages is a dark fantasy / science-fiction single-player experience that delivers the searing combat and over-the-top visuals of the incomparable DOOM franchise, powered by the latest idTech engine.

Key Features

  • Reign in Hell – As the super weapon of gods and kings, shred enemies with devastating favorites like the Super Shotgun while also wielding a variety of new bone-chewing weapons, including the versatile Shield Saw. Players will stand and fight on the demon-infested battlefields in the vicious, grounded combat the original DOOM is famous for. Take flight atop the new fierce Mecha Dragon, stand tall in a massive Atlan mech, and beat demons to a pulp with the newly enhanced glory kill system. Only the Slayer has the power to wield these devastating tools of mayhem.
  • The Origin of Your Rage – Experience the origin story of the DOOM Slayer’s rage in this epic, cinematic and action-packed story. Bound to serve as the super weapon of gods and kings, the DOOM Slayer fends off demon hordes as their leader seeks to destroy the Slayer and become the only one that is feared. Witness the creation of a legend as the Slayer takes on all of Hell and turns the tide of the war.
  • Discover Unknown Realms – In his quest to crush the legions of Hell, the Slayer must take the fight to never-before-seen realms. Mystery, challenges, and rewards lurk in every shadow of ruined castles, epic battlefields, dark forests, ancient hellscapes, and worlds beyond. Armed with the viciously powerful Shield Saw, cut through a dark world of menace and secrets in id’s largest and most expansive levels to date.

DOOM: The Dark Ages is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on May 15. It will also be available via Xbox Game Pass.

Watch the trailer below.

Official Trailer #2

item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy, more
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/this-weeks-japanese-game-releases-clair-obscur-expedition-33-fatal-fury-city-of-the-wolves-the-hundred-line-last-defense-academy-more

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Utawarerumono trilogy for Switch, Super Technos World, etc.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC, and The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy for Switch and PC are the highlights of this week’s Japanese game releases.

Also due out this week are the individual releases of the Utawarerumono trilogy for Switch, Super Technos World: River City & Technos Arcade Classics for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC, and TriggerHeart EXELICA Enhanced for Switch.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.

Physical and Digital

  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • Asian Version (PS5)
  • Everafter Falls (PS5, Switch) – Already available worldwide.
  • Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark (PS5, Switch) – Already available digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
  • Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves (PS5, PS4) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version
      • Special Edition (PS5, PS4, Xbox Series)
      • Deluxe Edition (PS5)
    • European Version (PS5, PS4, Xbox Series)
    • Asian Version (PS5, PS4)
  • The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version
      • Standard Edition (Switch)
      • Limited Edition (Switch)
    • European Version (Switch)
    • Asian Version (Switch)
  • Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 13 (PS5, PS4)
  • Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club: TOKIMEKI Roadmap (Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (Switch)
      • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Meg’s Monster (Switch) – Already available digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Moving Out (Switch) – Already available worldwide.
  • Nekura na Classmate ga Ore no Ibukuro o Tsukande Hanashite Kurenai (Switch, PC)
    • Limited Edition (Switch, PC)
  • Overcooked! All You Can Eat (New Price Edition) (PS5) – Already available worldwide.
  • Snow Bros. 2 Special (Switch) – Already available digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Starship Troopers: Extermination (PS5) – Already available worldwide.
    • Deluxe Edition (PS5)
  • Super Technos World: River City & Technos Arcade Classics (PS5, Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Asian Version (PS5, Switch)
  • TriggerHeart EXELICA Enhanced (Switch)
    • Limited Edition (Switch)
  • Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen (Switch)
  • Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception (Switch)
  • Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth (Switch)

Digital-Only

  • 9th Dawn Remake (PS5, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Ao Oni: The Horror of Blueberry Onsen (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Asura The Striker (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Beholder Conductor (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • BOKURA: planet (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 (Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Epic Games Store, Microsoft Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dolls Nest (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dreamy Syrup (Switch, PC [Steam, DLsite]) – Launching worldwide.
  • EcoGnomix (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One) – Launching worldwide.
  • Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves (Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Kindaichi Mystery Series: The Honjin Murders (Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Logiart Grimoire (PS4) – Launching worldwide.
  • Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club: TOKIMEKI Roadmap (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • METRO QUESTER (iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.
  • NanoApostle (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One) – Launching worldwide.
  • Once Upon a Puppet (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • RailGods of Hysterra Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Rise of Rebellion (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Steel Seed (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Super Technos World: River City & Technos Arcade Classics (PC [Steam]) – Launching digitally worldwide.
  • Tempest Rising (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Two Strikes (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • World of Goo 2 (PS5, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

Demos, Betas, Updates, etc.

  • Mistfall Hunter Beta Test #2 (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Zenless Zone Zero Version 1.7 Update: “Bury Your Tears With the Past” (PS5, PC, iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.

item.title: Super Robot Wars Y launches August 28
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/super-robot-wars-y-launches-august-28

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Godzilla Singular Point, Reideen the Brave, and more join the fray.

Strategy RPG Super Robot Wars Y will launch for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 28, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Bandai Namco Forge Digitals announced.

The game will be available in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition (8,900 yen)
    • A copy of the game
    • Physical edition early purchase / digital edition pre-order bonus
      • Two additional area missions to obtain Cybuster, VangNex, and GranVang
      • “Special Starter Pack” bonus mission
  • Digital Deluxe Edition (14,200 yen)
    • A copy of the game
    • Downloadable Contents #1 and #2 Set
      • Downloadable Content #1 – Five new playable mechs, 16 new additional missions, two new additional assistant crew members.
      • Downloadable Content #2 – Five new playable mechs, 16 new additional missions, one new additional assistant crew member.
      • Early access to both downloadable contents.
      • Two additional area missions to obtain Xelguard, Tyranado, and Tyranado Rex
      • Downloadable Contents #1 and #2 Set purchase bonus mission
    • Bonus Mission Pack
      • 15 standalone side missions set between the main story. Clearing them will earn you powerful enhancement parts.
      • Bonus Mission Pack purchase bonus mission
    • Digital Deluxe Edition purchase bonus content
      • Enhancement Part 1: “Spirit of the Magic Blade” – Melee weapon attack power +200, movement +1.
      • Enhancement Part 2: “Spirit of the Magic Bullet” – Ranged weapon attack power +200, range +1 for map weapons / weapons with range other than 1)
      • Skill Program 1: “PG: Pre-Support: Acceleration” – Applies the spirit command “Acceleration,” which increases movement +3 only once.
      • Skill Program 2: “PG: Pre-Support: Effort” – Applies the spirit command “Effort,” which doubles the EXP gained the next time you attack an enemy.
      • Credit: 50,000
      • MXP: 10,000
  • Digital Ultimate Edition (18,000 yen)
    • A copy of the game
    • Downloadable Contents #1 and #2 Set
    • Bonus Mission Pack
    • Premium Sound & Data Pack
      • Anime songs and sounds: 31 tracks
      • Original background music: 15 tracks
      • Art book: 55 pages
      • Premium Sound & Data Pack bonus mission
    • Digital Deluxe Edition purchase bonus content
    • Digital Ultimate Edition purchase bonus content
      • Digital Ultimate Edition purchase bonus mission
      • Enhancement Part 1: “Spirit of Super Strength” – Melee weapon attack power +100, ranged weapon attack power +100. Recovers 10 percent of maximum EN when your party starts an action.
      • Enhancement Part 2: “Soldier Medallion” – Vitality +30, maximum vitality +30. The maximum vitality increase effect does not stack with other parts.
      • Credit: 50,000
      • MXP: 10,000
  • Super Limited Edition (27,200 yen)
    • A copy of the game
    • Original soundtrack (76 tracks)
    • Acrylic stand set
    • Robot Spirits figure: Rundrache
    • Bonus content:
      • Digital Deluxe Edition bonus content
      • Digital Ultimate Edition bonus content
      • Physical edition early purchase / digital edition pre-order bonus content

The list of featured series includes:

  • Reideen the Brave
  • COMBATTLER V
  • Aura Battler Dunbine
  • New Story of Aura Battler Dunbine
  • Heavy Metal L-Gaim
  • Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam
  • Mobile Suit Gundam: Char’s Counterattack
  • M-MSV
  • Mobile Fighter G Gundam
  • Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
  • Mobile Suit Gundam: SEED DESTINY
  • Mobile Suit Gundam the Witch from Mercury Season 1
  • Mazinkaiser VS Great Darkness General
  • Getter Robo Arc
  • Majestic Prince
  • Macross Delta
  • Macross Delta: Passionate Walküre
  • Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion – Emperor
  • Code Geass Lelouch of the Re;surrection
  • Godzilla Singular Point
  • SSSS.DYNAZENON

Watch a new trailer and the archive of today’s Super Robot Wars Series News Station broadcast below.

Trailer #2

Japanese

Super Robot Wars Series News Station: April 20, 2025

item.title: Switch 2 ‘Now You’re Playing Together’ commercial featuring Paul Rudd
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/switch-2-now-youre-playing-together-commercial-featuring-paul-rudd

  • Switch 2

A callback to a 1991 Super Nintendo Entertainment System commercial.

Nintendo has released a new commercial for Switch 2 dubbed “Now You’re Playing Together,” which features actor Paul Rudd and is a callback to a 1991 Super Nintendo Entertainment System commercial that also featured Rudd.

The company also uploaded the original Super Nintendo Entertainment commercial as a direct comparison.

Switch 2 is due out on June 5. Pre-orders will open in the United States and Canada on April 24.

Watch the commercials below.

“Now You’re Playing Together” featuring Paul Rudd

Super Nintendo Entertainment System Commercial featuring Paul Rudd
